channel.title: Homework assignments on CFSS: Computing for the Social Sciences
channel.description: Recent content in Homework assignments on CFSS: Computing for the Social Sciences

item.title: HW01: Practice editing .md and .Rmd
item.description: Test software installation, GitHub setup, and homework submission process, as well as demonstrate basic competency in Markdown and R Markdown.

item.title: HW02: Exploring and visualizing data
item.description: Transform and explore a cleaned dataset on gun deaths in the United States.

item.title: HW03: Wrangling and visualizing data
item.description: Wrangle and explore messy datasets in practical research environments.

item.title: HW05: Debugging and practice working with functions
item.description: Resolve code errors and practice writing and using functions with social science data.

item.title: HW06: Generating reproducible social science research
item.description: Synthesize everything we have learned thus far.

item.title: HW07: Collecting and analyzing data from the web
item.description: Collect data from the web and analyze it.

item.title: HW08: Analyzing textual data
item.description: Collect text data and analyze it.
